page.title: 04Bracknell Police Station
page.content: The Bracknell division is part of the THAMES VALLEY POLICE whose H.Q. is at Kidlington,Oxfordshire.There are 82 officers in Bracknell,15 of them are C.I.D.offficers and the rest are in the uniformed branch.55 are constables 7 sergeants,3 inspectors,1 chief _ inspector,1 superintendant. Community policing was introduced in 1983 to improve the public's opinion of the police but it is taking time to have much effect. Bracknell is a difficult town to patrol but the alphabetical order of the street_names provides easier access.3/4 of crimes is committed are theft.30% of crime is committed by juveniles.Bracknell force covers Bracknell,Crowthorne,Sandhurst,Owls_ moor,Binfield,Warfield & Chavey Down.
